name: part_001
file: tmp_【 超重大告知あり‼ 】#鷹嶺ルイ生誕バンドLIVE 『L -challenger-』【生バンド3D LIVE】 [dLybZ8wDxVo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui presents the limited edition merchandise for her birthday celebration, including a plushie, an itabag, and a full set with a bonus voice and replica sign.
Takane Lui delivers an opening MC to welcome the audience to her birthday band live 'L -challenger-' and introduces the opening act.
holoX performs their unit song 'Meikyuu na Labyrinth' with live band accompaniment.

subtitles.original: サイズになっておりますので、
subtitles.english: ...so it's a size that

subtitles.original: 色んなところに連れて行っていただければなと思います。
subtitles.english: you can take with you to various places.

subtitles.original: 最後はこちら。ボディ痛バ！
subtitles.english: Last but not least, we have this: the Body Itabag!

subtitles.original: 今回のランダム缶バッジや、
subtitles.english: This itabag is a perfect match for the

subtitles.original: お出かけルイぬいぐるみとの相性もバッチリの痛バが登場です！
subtitles.english: random pin badges and the "Odekake Lui" plushie!

subtitles.original: 私のモチーフがさりげなくあしらわれたデザインで、
subtitles.english: The design features my motif subtly incorporated,

subtitles.original: 男女問わず使えるバッグになっております。
subtitles.english: making it a bag that anyone can use regardless of gender.

subtitles.english: Please get one and show off your support for Lui to the fullest!

subtitles.original: ということで、こちらの4種類のグッズが全て入った
subtitles.english: So, we also have a full set available that

subtitles.english: The full set comes with a foil-stamped replica

subtitles.english: For this one, I've put my heart into

subtitles.english: Although it's a limited quantity,

subtitles.english: I've prepared more than usual,

subtitles.original: 一人でも多くの方に手に取ってもらえたら嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: so I'd be happy if as many people as possible could get one.

subtitles.original: ぜひ聞いていただけると嬉しいです。
